mapper.select: SELECT tbc.id, tbc.parameter_code FROM jr_technology_bom_configuration tbc WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY tbc.parameter_inputting_date ORDER BY tbc.parameter_inputting_date DESC LIMIT 1;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jr_technology_bom_configuration ( parameter_state, parameter_code, parameter_part, parameter_with, parameter_attachment, parameter_instructions, parameter_inputting, parameter_inputting_date ) VALUES ( #{parameterState}, #{parameterCode}, #{parameterPart}, #{parameterWith}, #{parameterAttachment}, #{parameterInstructions}, #{parameterInputting}, #{parameterInputtingDate} )

INSERT INTO jr_technology_bom_configuration_schedule ( parameter_code, parameter_drawings, parameter_material, parameter_specifications, parameter_unit, parameter_brand, parameter_number, parameter_replace, parameter_note, parameter_date, parameter_material_code, parameter_location ) VALUES ( #{parameterCode}, #{parameterDrawings}, #{parameterMaterial}, #{parameterSpecifications}, #{parameterUnit}, #{parameterBrand}, #{parameterNumber}, #{parameterReplace}, #{parameterNote}, #{parameterDate}, #{parameterMaterialCode}, #{parameterLocation} )
mapper.select: SELECT tbc.id, tbc.parameter_part parameterPart, tbc.parameter_with parameterWith, tbc.parameter_attachment, tbc.parameter_instructions, tbc.parameter_code FROM jr_technology_bom_configuration tbc WHERE tbc.id = #{id}

SELECT tbcs.id, tbcs.parameter_code, tbcs.parameter_drawings, tbcs.parameter_material, tbcs.parameter_specifications, tbcs.parameter_unit, tbcs.parameter_brand, tbcs.parameter_number, tbcs.parameter_replace, tbcs.parameter_note, tbcs.parameter_material_code, tbcs.parameter_location FROM jr_technology_bom_configuration_schedule tbcs WHERE tbcs.parameter_code = #{parameterCode}
